body.name: Fix Sinking Office Chair,Adjustable Chair Sinking Stopper with Hexagon Wrench Office Chair Saver Kit Solid Stainless Steel Cylinder Replacement with Leather Pads Support for Stop Chair Sinking
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs
features: PACKAGE CONTENTS - You will receive 1 piece of 25-27mm/0.98-1.06 inch chair fixing tool and a hex wrench installation tool. This office chair gas lift cylinder bracket with silicone pads to hold the chair in place and prevent sinking, comes with a wrench tool to help you install and remove quickly.

PREMIUM MATERIAL - The office chair protector is made of high-quality 304 stainless steel, which is reliable in quality and not easy to be damaged; Compared with plastic protectors, our chair protectors can provide you with long-term use.

EASY TO INSTALL - First adjust the chair to the ideal height you want and mark it well. Then install the metal plate and rubber pad and clamp it at the lowest point, twist the screws hard with an Allen wrench and secure, try to sit down and fine tune it. This will take about 5 minutes, but once it's done, your chair won't sinking down again.

UNIQUE DESIGN - The screws of the tool to prevent the chair from sinking can be adjusted to fit different chairs, and most models of office chairs can be used. If the cylinder fails, this office chair clip can also fix the chair from sinking, saving you the cost of buying a new chair.

WIDE APPLICATION - The office chair piston is suitable for a variety of chairs(Diameter Range: 25-30mm), you can apply them at home, school, office, restaurant, cafe, bar and other places, helping to fix the office chairs.

reviews.reviewText: Works great, much better than replacing the chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Solution for my Almost Perfect Chair
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and sit for 8-10 hours a day. My old office chair, which I loved, finally had had it and needed replacing. I found one similar, but it was sinking a few times a day to an uncomfortable position. The bottom from the old one did not line up to replace with that one. So I needed to find a solution quick. I got this and it's saved this chair's life! It never moves now, staying at the perfect height for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT WORK
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my office chair at work as it sinks while I am sitting in it and it drives me crazy. I was excited to buy this item and I received it last night. I installed it on my office chair this morning and it does not work. Even tightened as tight as possible the chair still sinks the same as it did before and this item just slides down the shaft of the chair. I did double check to make sure it was as tight as possible to be sure and it is I am very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for and more
reviews.reviewText: Did not work as claimed! Chair still slips down! Waiste of money!!! Update, it was put on wrong. I reviewed videos and put it back on myself! Works as described..no problems once installed correctly.

reviews.reviewText: I securely attached the product to my chair and still, it slides down. I even tried turning the product around (as one person in the comments mentioned that it didn't work for him because it was upside down) still, the chair slid down.
